alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 3:32PM EDT until July 23 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL WAYNE COUNTY... At 332 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Grosse Ile, or 7 miles northeast of Flat Rock, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Wyandotte around 355 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Melvindale, Gibraltar, Ecorse, Southwest Detroit, River Rouge, Woodhaven, Lincoln Park, Riverview, Rockwood and Southgate. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
